channel.title: Free webhosting to run my enurscape site
channel.description:
I am looking for webhosting for my enurscape site
My free webhosting must have the following:
[ul][li]MySQL support for my SMF forums;[/li] [li]No file size limits;[/li] [li]At least 150MB of space;[/li] [li]A reasonable amount of bandwidth;[/li] [li]FTP so I can upload my page to it![/li][/ul]
It must be free and easy to sign up for (no posting 25 posts to sign up)
Any help would be appreciated, ada/enurscape creator
